title: NBC UNIVERSO Becomes The Exclusive U.S. Television Home For Leon And Pachuca Apertura 2015 Home Matches Beginning Tue., Sept. 29
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 11:36 AM Companies mentioned in this article: NBC UNIVERSO 
MIAMI, Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- NBC UNIVERSO, the modern sports and entertainment cable channel for Latinos, today announced that starting Sept. 29, through the remainder of the Liga MX Apertura 2015, it will exclusively telecast live the home games for Clubs Leon and F.C. Pachuca. The schedule includes seven Saturday night games, plus the match this coming Tues., Sept. 29, at 9:00p ET / 6:00p PT featuring Leon vs. America. 
As powerhouse America prepares for Tuesday's game, Las Aguilas seem to be surging at the right time in the season and ready to lead the league. As for Leon, La Fiera appear resilient and not ready to relinquish its leadership position. 
Providing narration and commentary for this and all the remaining Liga MX games on NBC UNIVERSO this season will be legendary sportscaster Andres Cantor, along with veteran soccer expert Sammy Sadovnik and former Mexican star player Carlos Hermosillo. 
The complete NBC UNIVERSO telecast schedule is below: Match Date Time ---- ---- Leon v. America Tue., Sept. 29 9:00p ET/6:00p PT Leon v. Pumas Sat., Oct. 17 9:00p ET/6:00p PT Pachuca v. Monarcas Sat., Oct. 24 9:00p ET/6:00p PT Leon v. Atlas Sat., Oct. 31 10:00p ET/7:00p PT Pachuca v. Leon Sat., Nov. 7 9:00p ET/6:00p PT Pachuca v. Cruz Azul Sat., Nov. 14 9:00p ET/6:00p PT Leon v. Dorados Sat., Nov. 21 9:00p ET/6:00p PT 
To catch all the on-field action of the game live on NBC UNIVERSO, fans can check their local TV listings, or visit www.nbcuniverso.com/encuentra to find channel information for NBC UNIVERSO on their cable, satellite and telco systems. Leon and Pachuca home games on NBC UNIVERSO will also be available on NBCDeportes.com and the NBC Deportes EN VIVO EXTRA mobile app. Fans will also be able to access every thrilling moment on all their devices across multiple platforms including Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. 
About NBC UNIVERSO: NBC UNIVERSO ( www.nbcuniverso.com ) is a modern sports and entertainment cable channel for Latinos, bringing the world's top sports franchises and edgy programming to more than 40 million households in the U.S. As one of the most widely available modern cable channels for U.S. Latinos, NBC UNIVERSO delivers a thrilling mix of exclusive sports action - including FIFA World Cup(TM), Liga MX, Premier League, NASCAR Mexico Series, NFL and The 2016 Rio Olympics - along with signature series, blockbuster movies, music, must-see live events and strategic acquisitions, on TV, online and mobile devices. NBC UNIVERSO is part of NBCUniversal Telemundo Enterprises, a division of NBCUniversal ( www.nbcuniversal.com ), one of the world's leading media and entertainment companies. NBCUniversal is a subsidiary of Comcast Corporation ( www.comcastcorporation.com ). To find the NBC UNIVERSO channel number in your area, please visit www.nbcuniverso.com/encuentralo .
